questions: Which algorithm is commonly used for solving classification problems with multiple classes?
Linear Regression
K-Nearest Neighbors
Naive Bayes
Softmax Regression
What is the purpose of the term 'batch normalization' in deep learning?
Normalize the input features
Normalize the output predictions
Normalize the gradients within a mini-batch
Normalize the learning rate
In reinforcement learning, what is an 'environment'?
The set of input features
The model architecture
The set of possible states and actions
The output predictions
What is the main difference between bagging and boosting in ensemble methods?
Bagging focuses on reducing model complexity, while boosting focuses on increasing it
Bagging combines multiple weak learners to create a strong learner, while boosting adapts the weights of weak learners
Bagging involves training each learner independently, while boosting trains learners sequentially
Bagging and boosting are synonymous terms
What is the role of the learning rate in gradient descent optimization?
Controls the step size during optimization
Specifies the number of hidden layers
Defines the regularization strength
Determines the threshold for model convergence
What is the main advantage of using a convolutional neural network (CNN) for image classification?
Suitable for tabular data
Performs well with small datasets
Automatically learns hierarchical features in spatial data
Efficient for sequence data
